mapper.select: select id, isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, m_title, pid, m_author, m_school, m_try, m_image from m_titles where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into m_titles(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, m_title, pid, m_author, m_school, m_try, m_image) values (#{isused}, #{createTime}, #{updateTime}, #{remarks}, #{mTitle}, #{pid}, #{mAuthor}, #{mSchool}, #{mTry}, #{mImage})

insert into m_titles(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, m_title, pid, m_author, m_school, m_try, m_image) values
(#{entity.isused}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.mTitle}, #{entity.pid}, #{entity.mAuthor}, #{entity.mSchool}, #{entity.mTry}, #{entity.mImage})

insert into m_titles(isUsed, create_time, update_time, remarks, m_title, pid, m_author, m_school, m_try, m_image) values
(#{entity.isused}, #{entity.createTime}, #{entity.updateTime}, #{entity.remarks}, #{entity.mTitle}, #{entity.pid}, #{entity.mAuthor}, #{entity.mSchool}, #{entity.mTry}, #{entity.mImage})
on duplicate key update isUsed = values(isUsed), create_time = values(create_time), update_time = values(update_time), remarks = values(remarks), m_title = values(m_title), pid = values(pid), m_author = values(m_author), m_school = values(m_school), m_try = values(m_try), m_image = values(m_image)
mapper.update:
update m_titles
isUsed = #{isused},
create_time = #{createTime},
update_time = #{updateTime},
remarks = #{remarks},
m_title = #{mTitle},
pid = #{pid},
m_author = #{mAuthor},
m_school = #{mSchool},
m_try = #{mTry},
m_image = #{mImage},
where id = #{id}
